verses.roman:
śarmiṣṭhājānatī vāso
guru-putryāḥ samavyayat
svīyaṁ matvā prakupitā
devayānīdam abravīt

synonyms: śarmiṣṭhā—the daughter of Vṛṣaparvā; ajānatī—without knowledge; vāsaḥ—the dress; guru-putryāḥ—of Devayānī, the daughter of the guru; samavyayat—put on the body; svīyam—her own; matvā—thinking; prakupitā—irritated and angry; devayānī—the daughter of Śukrācārya; idam—this; abravīt—said.
translation: Śarmiṣṭhā unknowingly put Devayānī's dress on her own body, thus angering Devayānī, who then spoke as follows.
